column2: Heavy rainfall during the spring is good for growing crops in [This.GetName], but the mud hinders travel.
The heavy rainfall in [This.GetName] is bad for crops which are ripening or ready to be harvested.
The stormy weather in [This.GetName] is damaging crops and wreaking havoc on livestock.
The lack of precipitation in [This.GetName] is causing a drought. Crops and livestock are dying and many people are suffering.
Rats have gotten into food stores all across [This.GetName].
With so much rain falling in [This.GetName], rivers are overflowing their banks and flooding nearby lands, destroying crops, drowning livestock, and driving people from their homes.
Wind and rain is battering the coastlines in [This.GetName]. The higher than normal swells are inundating low-lying areas with salty water and wreaking havoc on shipping.
[This.GetName] is suffering through a brutally hot summer.
